授業方法:
This course will be held face-to-face and conducted entirely in English. Students are expected to use English in class as much as possible. This course will require students to read about a variety of topics in English, which will hopefully be of interest to them and encourage them to enjoy reading in English more. Students will also be required to take part in pair and group discussions to discuss what the text meant and their ideas related to it.
In addition to the textbook, other supplementary materials will be used related to the topics and students will be expected to choose and read books that interest them outside of class as homework. There will be a focus on vocabulary building with possible vocabulary quizzes. The instructor will help students develop reading strategies that will increase their comprehension ability.
